value.title: WORLD RECORD! uThermal's 1 Terran v 7 Insane Terran AI (PiG Reacts) - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: I challenged StarCraft 2 Pros to take on 7 Random INSANE Cheater AIs at once! uThermal already did 1 Terran vs 7 Zerg Insane AIs. Then HeroMarine stepped up with 1 Terran vs 7 Random Insane AIs. Now uThermal is back with 1 Terran vs 7 TERRAN Insane AIs. How many world records can these guys break?!
